code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant CLI as CLI Command
    participant Service as EventReindexingService
    participant OpenSearch as OpenSearch Cluster
    participant Bookmark as Bookmark API
    participant Metadata as RDM Records Index

    CLI->>Service: reindex_events(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    Service->>Service: update_and_verify_templates(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Service->>OpenSearch: Check/Update Templates

    loop For Each Event Type
        Service->>OpenSearch: get_monthly_indices(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
        OpenSearch-->>Service: List of monthly indices

        loop For Each Monthly Index
            Service->>Service: migrate_monthly_index(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
            Service->>OpenSearch: create_enriched_index(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
            OpenSearch-->>Service: New index name

            Service->>Bookmark: get_bookmark(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
            Bookmark-->>Service: Last processed ID

            loop Batch Processing
                Service->>Service: check_health_conditions(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
                Service->>OpenSearch: process_monthly_index_batch(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
                Service->>Metadata: get_metadata_for_records(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
                Metadata-->>Service: Record metadata
                Service->>Service: enrich_events(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
                Service->>OpenSearch: bulk_index(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
                Service->>Bookmark: set_bookmark(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
            end

            Service->>Service: validate_enriched_data(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
            Service->>OpenSearch: update_aliases(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)

            alt Current Month Index
                Service->>OpenSearch: setup_write_alias(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
                Service->>OpenSearch: migrate_new_records(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
            end

            Service->>OpenSearch: delete_old_index(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
        end
    end

    Service-->>CLI: Migration results
repo_description: A usage statistics dashboard for InvenioRDM instances
